name: Cat-tastrophe!
description:
You've just settled into your new house and... Dang it! You've lost your cats! You know they love getting into your stuff, so you'll need to find them before they get into anything! Cat-tastrophe is a chill, short game of kitty hide and seek about going around the small house you now call home and finding your cats in all the different places they wait for you.

PLEASE NOTE: I don't have a Mac or a Linux, so I was unable to test if they work alright on those. It does work just fine on Windows, though. They probably won't have the game's icon, either.

So this is my third game! As such, don't expect a whole lot from it in terms of quantity, but what's there, I'm happy about! I do have an idea of how I can expand the game in the future, increasing the map size immensely and in turn, the hiding spots plus some other things. However, I may decide to work on other projects in the end instead.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Camera
Left Mouse Button - Collect cats
Space - Jump
Shift - Crouch
